verses.roman:
paṇḍita, gambhīra, duṅhe-prāmāṇika jana
bāla-cāñcalya kare, karāha varjana

synonyms: paṇḍita—learned scholars; gambhīra—very grave; duṅhe—both of them; prāmāṇika jana—authoritative persons; bāla-cāñcalya kare—sport like children; karāha varjana—ask them to stop.
translation: "Tell Bhaṭṭācārya and Rāmānanda Rāya to stop their childish play because they are both learned scholars and very grave and great personalities."
